:ptv-greetings:
:ptv-hearts:
Just had a shower after power washing the stairs.
One would not believe the amount of muck on the paving slabs. They were filthy.
Even though I live a decently nice area, most buildings look like they needed to power wash the sides for 10+ years xD
My dad told me that the machine could rip my bare skin off if I pointed it at myself.
Seeing it tear through the grime, I see his point.
There's lots of work outside to do....
He shoulda set up a "fun" demo
Get a chicken breast, hang it off something, blast it with the power washer :D
Waste of good food if you ask me.
Besides, I take his word for it.
*boom*, traumatized AND know how dangerous the thing is ^^
Its common sense not to point a power washer at one's foot.
Common sense?  What's that?  Some kind of fancy spice?
He showed me by pointing it at a particulary grimy slab, and washing it.
The muck flew in gobs.
Lesson learned.
And no chicken wasted.
:ctwokinds-floraquestion:
when you have a dream about totally mundane stuff
suddenly remember it in the middle of the day
then spend 10 minutes confused as to if it actually happened
I know the feeling.
At least, the few times I remember my dreams.
I typically either don't dream, have movie-worthy dreams.  Or am trying to fall asleep in bed with random thoughts racing.
And said thoughts are pissing me off, but when I become aware of the situation, I sit up in bed confused and irritated, and can't even remember what said thoughts were
Which makes it even more irritating!
Random aside:  I have 3 dreams that I remember which are illustration worthy
Cool
Quill, what's the weirdest dream you ever had?
Ummm...
I can't really remember...
Heck, I don't really remember my dreams.

I learned the secret to watching super-long videos about legal jargon.
Up the playback to 1.5. :ptv-laugh:
Today's storms seem to all be going south of me. :ptv-pouty:
Anyone else get to "enjoy" some bad weather today?
I was! It wasn't even bad, just very heavy rain which was great, it was nice and cool and really awesome.
Jealous :ptv-unimpressed:
Well we've got heat waves forecasted so I woudln't be too jealous. :p Also it barely rains here and once it does, its the tiniest little sprinkle that doesn't even make you wet.
I live in a fun state that gets very wet at various times of year
So if it's green and wet, I'm happy ^^
Well, except when I need to mow the lawn... At which point it better have been sunny and warm the past few days.
Thunder... why do you tease me so???
...I HEAR RAIN, HALLELUJER!!!
